title: First-time Arabic font designer
content:
I just finished my first Arabic font (well, the alphabet of it at least, still have the numbers and punctuation to go) and would really appreciate some (heavy if needed) critiquing and figure y'all might be interested in seeing a new Arabic font. (see preview below)

Here's a [link to the critique page](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414221954/http:/typophile.com/node/56233)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414221954im_/http:/typophile.com/files/coruna_arabic_titler_3552.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [coruna\_arabic\_titler.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414221954/http:/typophile.com/files/coruna_arabic_titler.png) | 13.68 KB |
author: guifa

comments.content:
Matthew

I can only see one word: كورونا

Your ra is disproportionate, I like to see ra and waw harmonious

-Saad

Saad, the rest is on the critique page, [http://typophile.com/node/56233](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414221954/http:/typophile.com/node/56233 "http://typophile.com/node/56233")

_«El futuro es una línea tan fina que apenas nos damos cuenta de pintarla nosotros mismos». (La Luz Oscura, por Javier Guerrero)_
Go Go, L2R+R2L! Love your coiled Waw+Ra
